verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the eleventh <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the third <S%H7992><s%> month, in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and to his multitude; <S%H1995><s%> Whom <S%H413><s%> <S%H4310><s%> are you like <S%H1819><s%> in your greatness? <S%H1433><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> was a cedar <S%H730><s%> in Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> with fair <S%H3303><s%> branches, <S%H6057><s%> and with a shadowing <S%H6751><s%> shroud, <S%H2793><s%> and of an high <S%H1362><s%> stature; <S%H6967><s%> and his top <S%H6788><s%> was among <S%H996><s%> the thick <S%H5688><s%> boughs. <S%H5688><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> made him great, <S%H1431><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> set <S%H7311><s%> him up on high <S%H7311><s%> with her rivers <S%H5104><s%> running <S%H1980><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about his plants, <S%H4302><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> her little <S%H8585><s%> rivers <S%H8585><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> his height <S%H6967><s%> was exalted <S%H1361><s%> above all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and his boughs <S%H5634><s%> were multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and his branches <S%H6288><s%> became <S%H748><s%> long <S%H748><s%> because of the multitude <S%H7227><s%> of waters, <S%H4325><s%> when he shot <S%H7971><s%> forth.

All <S%H3605><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> made their nests <S%H7077><s%> in his boughs, <S%H5589><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> his branches <S%H6288><s%> did all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> bring <S%H3205><s%> forth <S%H3205><s%> their young, and under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>
Thus was he fair <S%H3302><s%> in his greatness, <S%H1433><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of his branches: <S%H1808><s%> for his root <S%H8328><s%> was by great <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>

The cedars <S%H730><s%> in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> could not hide <S%H6004><s%> him: the fir <S%H1265><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> were not like his boughs, <S%H5589><s%> and the chestnut <S%H6196><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%> were not like <S%H1819><s%> his branches; <S%H6288><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was like <S%H1819><s%> to him in his beauty. <S%H3308><s%>

I have made him fair <S%H3303><s%> by the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his branches: <S%H1808><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden, <S%H5731><s%> that were in the garden <S%H1588><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> him.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have lifted <S%H1361><s%> up yourself in height, <S%H6967><s%> and he has shot <S%H7971><s%> up his top <S%H6788><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the thick <S%H5688><s%> boughs, <S%H5688><s%> and his heart <S%H3824><s%> is lifted <S%H7311><s%> up in his height; <S%H1363><s%>

I have therefore delivered <S%H5414><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> one of the heathen; <S%H1471><s%> he shall surely deal <S%H6213><s%> with him: I have driven <S%H1644><s%> him out for his wickedness. <S%H7562><s%>

And strangers, <S%H2114><s%> the terrible <S%H6184><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> have cut <S%H3772><s%> him off, and have left <S%H5203><s%> him: on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the valleys <S%H1516><s%> his branches <S%H1808><s%> are fallen, <S%H5307><s%> and his boughs <S%H6288><s%> are broken <S%H7665><s%> by all <S%H3605><s%> the rivers <S%H650><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are gone <S%H3381><s%> down from his shadow, <S%H6738><s%> and have left <S%H5203><s%> him.

On his ruin <S%H4658><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> remain, <S%H7931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be on his branches: <S%H6288><s%>

To the end <S%H4616><s%> that none <S%H3808><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> by the waters <S%H4325><s%> exalt <S%H1361><s%> themselves for their height, <S%H6967><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shoot <S%H5414><s%> up their top <S%H6788><s%> among <S%H413><s%> the thick <S%H5688><s%> boughs, <S%H5688><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> their trees <S%H352><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> up in their height, <S%H1363><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that drink <S%H8354><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%> for they are all <S%H3605><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> to death, <S%H4194><s%> to the nether <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth, <S%H776><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> with them that go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit. <S%H953><s%>

Thus said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> when he went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%> I caused a mourning: <S%H56><s%> I covered <S%H3680><s%> the deep <S%H8415><s%> for him, and I restrained <S%H4513><s%> the floods <S%H5104><s%> thereof, and the great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> were stayed: <S%H3607><s%> and I caused Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> to mourn <S%H6937><s%> for him, and all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> fainted <S%H5969><s%> for him.

I made the nations <S%H1471><s%> to shake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of his fall, <S%H4658><s%> when I cast <S%H3381><s%> him down <S%H3381><s%> to hell <S%H7585><s%> with them that descend <S%H3381><s%> into the pit: <S%H953><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden, <S%H5731><s%> the choice <S%H4005><s%> and best <S%H2896><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> shall be comforted <S%H5162><s%> in the nether <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

They also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into hell <S%H7585><s%> with him to them that be slain <S%H2491><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and they that were his arm, <S%H2220><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> under his shadow <S%H6738><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>

To whom <S%H4310><s%> are you thus <S%H3602><s%> like <S%H1819><s%> in glory <S%H3519><s%> and in greatness <S%H1433><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden? <S%H5731><s%> yet shall you be brought <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with the trees <S%H6086><s%> of Eden <S%H5731><s%> to the nether <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth: <S%H776><s%> you shall lie <S%H7901><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> with them that be slain <S%H2491><s%> by the sword. <S%H2719><s%> This <S%H1931><s%> is Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his multitude, <S%H1995><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
